permissions: Admins can update material type conversions. Non-admin users can update conversions if they are manager members of the conversion's broker or manager members of the conversion's material supplier.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one updatable field must be specified. --material-type, --foreign-material-supplier, and --foreign-material-type cannot be empty when provided. --material-site and --foreign-material-site may be set to an empty value to clear. material_site must be related to the material supplier when provided. material_type must be generic or related to the material supplier. foreign_material_site must be related to the foreign material supplier when provided. foreign_material_type must be generic or related to the foreign material supplier.

flags.name: --material-site
flags.description: Local material site ID (optional; pass empty to clear)
flags.validation: May be set to an empty value to clear.

flags.name: --foreign-material-site
flags.description: Foreign material site ID (optional; pass empty to clear)
flags.validation: May be set to an empty value to clear.
